description: High-level cluster health and performance monitoring for Restate Server

panels.description: Effective partition leaders vs total partitions. Should be equal when cluster is healthy.
panels.title: Leaders

panels.description: Error rate per node - identify problematic nodes
panels.title: Errors by Node

panels.description: Number of partition leaders per node. In a healthy cluster, leaders should be evenly distributed.
panels.title: Leaders by Node

panels.description: Number of follower partitions per node (active partitions that are not leaders).

targets.expr: sum by (node_name) (restate_num_active_partitions{cluster_name="$cluster", node_name=~"$node"}) - sum by (node_name) (restate_partition_is_effective_leader{cluster_name="$cluster", node_name=~"$node"})

panels.title: Followers by Node

panels.description: Leader and follower distribution over time. Leaders are positive, followers are negative.
panels.title: Partition Roles Over Time

panels.description: RSS memory per node - identify memory-heavy nodes
panels.title: Memory by Node (Resident)

panels.description: RocksDB write buffer usage vs capacity (cluster total)
panels.title: Write Buffer Memory

panels.description: P99 latency per node - identify slow nodes
panels.title: HTTP Latency (P99 by Node)

panels.description: Task status per node - identify struggling nodes
panels.title: Invoker Tasks by Node

title: Restate: Overview
